channel.title: [Added] Add UK Government Organisation Register to OrganisationRegistrationAgency codelist
channel.description:
It is proposed that the [UK Government Organisation Register](http://government-organisation.alpha.openregister.org/) be added to the [OrganisationRegistrationAgency](http://iatistandard.org/codelists/OrganisationRegistrationAgency/) codelist. More information about the registry is available here: https://data.blog.gov.uk/2017/03/27/the-register-of-government-organisations-is-now-in-alpha/
**Proposed code:** GB-GOR
**Title:** UK Government Organisation Register
**Description:** The Government Organisation Register is an authoritative source of government organisations who have a presence on GOV.UK. This register includes ministerial departments and executive agencies but does not include classifications (e.g. arms length bodies) or any form of organisational hierarchy
**Category:** GB
**URL:** http://government-organisation.alpha.openregister.org/
**Public database:** Yes
Note that this register is different from the existing registries of UK Government agencies already on the OrganisationRegistrationAgency codelist: `GB-GOV` and `GB-GOVUK`.

item.dc:creator: dalepotter

item.title: [Added] Add UK Government Organisation Register to OrganisationRegistrationAgency codelist
item.dc:creator: dalepotter
item.description:
These additions to the OrganisationRegistrationAgency codelist is now live: http://iatistandard.org/codelists/OrganisationRegistrationAgency/

In light of this, I have updated the title of this post to [Added].

Read full topic
